description: In order to select your theme, you must place your XCCOLORTHEME file in the ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Xcode/​Color Themes directory. If the "Color Themes" folder doesn't exist yet, simply create that folder and restart Xcode. Then, you can select your color theme in the application. Select Xcode → Preferences... , choose "Fonts & Colors, select your theme, and click Apply .
NOTE: .DVTCOLORTHEME files replaced XCCOLORTHEME files in Xcode 4.
